messages.subject: All members please read. Database
messages.msgSnippet: Some of the members already know that I am creating companion website to the SHQ and the MB. It s just a one stop shop for finding websites, commercial
messages.messageBody:
Some of the members already know that I am creating companion
website to the SHQ and the MB. It's just a one stop shop for finding
websites, commercial releases and fan fiction/artwork. The test site
is up http://geocities.com/mg_batt and will launch in
www.shinsengumidb.com. It will just be links/summaries, no archiving
is done. For a user to view your work they will have to use the link
and follow it either to your own website or at the archiving website
like ff.net.

Now I would like to merge the database here in the yahoo group and
copy over the entries to the website. I will be doing that
tonight. . The summaries I will use whatever your have on your
website or ff.net. If you need something to be edited and for those
who do not want to be included, please drop me a line so I can
remove/edit the entry. When the website is officially launched you
can also add entries.

For those other stories that are not listed here in the database, I
will be sending out "I want your permission" e-mails... *wounds
crosses fingers and mutters "I hope they say yes".*

Thanks for your time... :O)

~wounds

---- To phil ----

I got your e-mail. I will not be taking your entries in the group
database, until you are ready. So let me know because I don't want
to miss out on those wonderful yaoi stories. :O)

Phil, sec mentioned a link to the livejournal SHQ for the fanfic
challenges, can I go ahead and put the link on the website?
